code: 'use strict';var utils=require("./utils");var assert=require('minimalistic-assert');function Hmac(hash,key,enc){if(!(this instanceof Hmac))return new Hmac(hash,key,enc);this.Hash=hash;this.blockSize=hash.blockSize/8;this.outSize=hash.outSize/8;this.inner=null;this.outer=null;this._init(utils.toArray(key,enc));}module.exports=Hmac;Hmac.prototype._init=function init(key){if(key.length>this.blockSize)key=new this.Hash().update(key).digest();assert(key.length<=this.blockSize);for(var i=key.length;i<this.blockSize;i++){key.push(0);}for(i=0;i<key.length;i++){key[i]^=0x36;}this.inner=new this.Hash().update(key);for(i=0;i<key.length;i++){key[i]^=0x6a;}this.outer=new this.Hash().update(key);};Hmac.prototype.update=function update(msg,enc){this.inner.update(msg,enc);return this;};Hmac.prototype.digest=function digest(enc){this.outer.update(this.inner.digest());return this.outer.digest(enc);};
